function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased household electricity consumption due to extended time spent at home during quarantine","Impact":"Higher energy bills and increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient technologies and behavior changes to reduce energy consumption","Technologies":"Smart home energy management systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Residents, households","Owner":"Homeowners, property managers"},{"Description":"Increased energy consumption in unoccupied public buildings during lockdown","Impact":"Wasted energy and increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Efficient building management, installation of energy-efficient systems, raising awareness on energy conservation","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Facility managers, building administrators","Owner":"Building owners, local government"},{"Description":"Challenges in controlling the consumption of natural resources in epidemic-resilient homes","Impact":"Environmental degradation and increased strain on resources","Mitigation":"Sustainable development practices, resource-efficient design, and technologies","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, water-efficient fixtures, waste management systems","People":"Architects, urban planners, developers","Owner":"Construction companies, local authorities"}]}
